articles.author: Brooke Steinberg
articles.title: A drink a day could keep heart attacks away: American College of Cardiology - New York Post
articles.description: Researchers looked at data from more than 50,000 patients to understand why previous studies have shown that light and moderate drinkers experience fewer cardiac events.
articles.content:
Here’s to heart health and a much-deserved moment to unwind.
A new study published in the Journal of the American College of Cardiology revealed that light to moderate alcohol consumption can lead t… [+3156 chars]

articles.author: The Quint
articles.title: 'Sidhu Moose Wala ka 295 lagao,' Says Rahul Gandhi as He Takes Truck Ride in US - The Quint
articles.description: Congress leader Rahul Gandhi took a truck ride, but this time it was in the US. In his recent visit to the USA, the former MP hopped onto a truck and took a 190-km “American Truck Yatra” from Washington DC to New York with driver Taljinder Singh.
articles.content:
From what they (truckers) eat and how many hours they drive to how much they earn, Gandhi was interested in knowing everything.
"How much do you earn?" Rahul Gandhi was heard asking the driver.
To … [+486 chars]
